h a loud growl

ng to protect the

imals who did seem

ves a loud warning roar to the approaching figures.

<NEW>

A loud answerin=
g roar could be heard in the distance as the shapes
speed up their approach=
!

The other animals that were with TUSCON quickly scatter, all too ready
t=
o leave him alone with whatever was coming to face him. The clearing
TUSCON=
 is standing in is approximately 30=92 wide with little or no tree
cover an=
d whatever birds that have been in the tree tops flap their
wings and take =
to the skies in an outpouring of fear. The trees
themselves rustle as anima=
ls of all sorts vacate! As they do so the
sound of the approaching shapes g=
ot steadily louder. Trees crack,
brush is uprooted, and the heavy thud of f=
eet moving swiftly through
the jungle could be clearly heard.

Out of the t=
rees four shapes come lumbering through into the clearing
with TUSCON, anot=
her loud roar accompanying their arrival!

The first to be seen is a large =
Tyrannosaurus Rex, standing at 10 and
massively built he is as fully as lar=
ge and massive as TUSCON himself,
it takes only a moment to recognize him. =
His colors are different,
instead of the silver and grey paint job of forme=
r times he is black,
gold and chrome. Other then that he looks exactly like=
 a transmetal
version of GRIMLOCK!

Behind him came a Triceratops, an Apato=
saurus and a Stegosaurus all in
the same sort of black, gold and chrome tra=
nsmetal motif lumber
forward, their heavy weight smashing through anything =
in their path:
SLAG, SLUDGE and SNARL all of them as large as GRIMLOCK!

Wi=
th no words save a savage growl GRIMLOCK ran at TUSCON his jaws open
wide, =
black teeth ready to rip and shred as the other three transmetal
dinosaurs =
spread out hoping to get a bite as well.
